Package frc.math

Class Translation2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • frc.math.Translation2d
  • public class Translation2d
extends java.lang.Object
    A translation in a 2d coordinate frame. Translations are simply shifts in an (x, y) plane.

      • identity

        public static final Translation2d identity()

      • norm

        public double norm()
        The "norm" of a transform is the Euclidean distance in x and y.
        Returns:
        sqrt(x ^ 2 + y ^ 2)

      • translateBy

        public Translation2d translateBy​(Translation2d other)
        We can compose Translation2d's by adding together the x and y shifts.
        Parameters:
        other - The other translation to add.
        Returns:
        The combined effect of translating by this object and the other.

      • rotateBy

        public Translation2d rotateBy​(Rotation2d rotation)
        We can also rotate Translation2d's. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rotation_matrix
        Parameters:
        rotation - The rotation to apply.
        Returns:
        This translation rotated by rotation.

      • direction

        public Rotation2d direction()

      • inverse

        public Translation2d inverse()
        The inverse simply means a Translation2d that "undoes" this object.
        Returns:
        Translation by -x and -y.
